content: based on the stor rund dug doily 1 with significant alterations i used about 500 yards of stranded baby alpaca and baby mohair laceweight many thanks to yarnover for translating this beautiful pattern from the danish for the doily pattern which could make a lovely round blanket check out the linked pattern 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sterndolde-stor-rund-dug
